website_summaries.verdict: Hands-down the best value for money, this 3-pack of tempered glass screen protectors safeguards both your screen and your eyes without sacrificing clarity or functionality.
pros: Thin profile doesn't interfere with touchscreen sensitivity
Dimensions fit perfectly for total coverage
High transparency ensures clear and natural display
Unique blue light filter combats eye strain
Fingerprint-resistant coating for a clear, easy to clean display
Includes swabs, microfiber cloth, and installation guide
cons: Precision fit can make perfect application a touch difficult

customer_reviews.title: Very precise  fit
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised with how well cut the glass is, and just how precise the cuts are around the edge which covers the screen perfectly to the edge. There's no rainbow effect from the adhesive either. for $9 I think this is money well spent and while I am sure this glass isn't on par with the durability of something like gorilla glass, 3 screen protectors for the price of $9 is a great deal in my book. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: VBDSChiste

customer_reviews.title: 0 air bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Screen protectors were easy to apply and the product came with materials to clean the screen prior to applying the protector to ensure there was no dust caught underneath. Following the directions resulted in 0 air bubbles. The pack of 3 gives peace of mind in case something were to happen and I need to apply another screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Ate away my screen!
customer_reviews.text: I put this screen protector on my Switch the day I got it (the Switch), and thought it was good. The wipes left a few specks of moisture on the screen, but the instructions indicate that should work itself out with time and use. Well, they became a big bubble instead. I ignored it for a while, but today I decided to replace the screen protector, and found the solvent in the wipes had EATEN AWAY the glass of my screen! It's permanently damaged! So much for a screen protector, I'm so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: The only "problem" I had was the included "hinge" stickers weren't able to really stick to the glass all that well. I would suggest for most users with steady hands to just apply without these stickers. The only suggestion I would have for the manufacturer would be to include a link to a YouTube video to demonstrate, rather than rely exclusively on printed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of the best screen protectors i've used
customer_reviews.text: Installation was so simple using the sticker hinge trick. Just take your time being careful when you line it up and you can't fail. Also, I didn't even end up with a single bubble when installing, which is like crazy voodoo magic or something. I've installed countless protectors on phones and tablets and seem to always have to squeegee out some bubbles over a few days. It also in near invisible when on, except for the few cut outs it needs. Didn't seem to dim or distort the screen at all. Incredibly happy with this purchase at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Luxowell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought a 3 pack cause it only PARTIALLY worked on the third try
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the instructions are pretty straightforward but aren't exactly accurate, on the final steps they tell you to put the screen protector on the device, and then tap in the center. That's great EXCEPT right when you put it on it seals on its own, no time to tap, tons of bubbles that wont go away no matter how much you push them to the side, on my third try I put it down mostly perfectly, and then in one area the screen wont go all the way down so there is an air bubble on the edge, and it won't go away. Incredibly absurdly frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Foster E

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for the Switch.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to the letter and the screen protector fit perfectly. I had one small bubble that I worked to the bottom just off the viewing area. The instructions said to give it 24 hours or so and small bubbles will disappear. The next day the sole bubble had vanished. Great product with good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: WILL O

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE DUST STICKERS
customer_reviews.text: I would hive it 5 stars except it 1. Doesn't have a microfiber cloth (my personal preference tho) 2. (This is the main reason) DO NOT use the dust remover stickers!! They're too sticky and will leave marks and adhesive behind on the switch's screen surface Otherwise, the product works perfect, the screen quality is great and anti-fingerprint. I have yet to test it outside for ant-glare tho
customer_reviews.author: Athlein

customer_reviews.title: They work great! The bubbles will dissipate in 24 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I went through 2 of these screen protectors. The first one had 2 little bubbles after installation. So, I peeled it off and started over. Same thing again! I was going to peel it and try again but the bubbles were not in an area where I felt like they would have been annoying while playing in handheld mode. Woke up the next day and the bubbles were gone! You can't even see the screen protector on the Switch at all. I gave the last one to a friend. These are great. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a great screen protector
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good instructions.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My daughter dropped the Switch and cracked our last screen protector, so I purchased these. The instructions are clear, and installation was smooth. I really took my time when placing the protector on its “hinges.” The hinges fell off a few times as I was cleaning/removing the film, and I had to quickly adjust them and re-stick them. I also used a rubber squeegee (from the screen protector for my smart watch) to remove the air bubbles. After a few hours, it was crystal clear and works perfectly. No touch issues, no cracking or bubbling.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great shield
customer_reviews.text: This is the second screen shield I bought for my Nintendo Switch. The first one was a little flimsy and didn't go on right. These, however, are awesome. They don't feel flimsy at all; they are built solid and will protect your screen. Make sure your screen surface is clean, take your time putting it on, and you will have a well protected Switch that you won't have to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I bought around $6. I have used many screen protectors in my lifetime, and a few on the Nintendo Switch. This is good quality material, packed well, and easy to apply with screen wipes to make sure you remove all dust. And you get 3 in the package, plus extras to help you apply them. If you need to protect your Switch screen, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Shapley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I bought the 3-pack. I’m pretty clumsy and dropped the first one, cracking it. But, hey, that’s why I need a screen protector, right? Directions were very clear and easy to follow. Screen protector fits perfectly on my Switch. No problem using my ERGO grip and the screen protector. I just put on the protector, so don’t have any info on how it holds up. I don’t like having to write a review in order to register my product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Just OK piece of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my current one, but it's inferior compared to other similar products here. The screen protector feels like a piece of hard clear plastic instead of glass. I wish they would have included the adhesive on both sides instead of one. Also, the instruction is useless so don't rely on it. Where is the freaking hinges?? The box is nice though. Took me 15 minutes in total; 5 mins to apply the protector and another 10 to remove bubbles and clean the protector surface. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: babydragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors fit perfectly and were easy to install. Directions for adequate and easy to follow. I like that the pack came with 3 screen protectors. You do have to be careful when installing to make sure there are no bubbles. Work it from one end, going back and forth making sure you push the air out as you go. Then when you reach the end go back to the side that you started from and like the screen carefully to release the air back to the point where there is no air bubbles and carefully work it back and forth pushing out the air as you go.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D

customer_reviews.title: Basic screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really used other screen protectors so I can’t compare. The cleaning towelettes included are ok, but I’d suggest getting a little rubbing alcohol and a lint free cloth instead. Dries a bit faster and gives a better result in my opinion. Doesn’t appear to affect clarity, sensitivity, or color of the screen. Coverage is quite close to exact and adhesive seems evenly applied. Like any appliqué, you need to be very sure you removed all dust and apply from the center out or from a side all the way across.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bride

customer_reviews.title: Went on perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the one I bought at GameStop when I got my switch which was dirty and awful and didn't fit right after I had to take it off twice to clean under it. I was glad this one was a three pack in case I messed up again. But I didn't mess it up - it went on perfectly and fit perfectly. My switch looks great like it doesn't even have a screen protector on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new nintendo switch. Installing was easy and had no air bubbles on the screen after installation :D I tried being one to see how much it can withstand and the tempered glass did break easily :D (in the name of science had to do this). So giving the screen a 4 star rating. if after use I feel the screen protector is awesome, would update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: vjshanky

customer_reviews.title: 2 CAME DEFECTIVE. BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: it comes in a pack of 3 right? well i just wasted 2 and only got the last one to work. the first one was uneven which created a giant bubble that wouldnt go away. the second one had something tiny on the sticky side already which obviously is upsetting because i have just used one and now another one is defective, so i used the last one the exact same way i installed the first two and it was perfect. so i'm highly disappointed that two came defective. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymousss

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I'm now on my third set (due to a replacement Switch and one for a family member) and every one has gone on perfect. Even had one shatter on a bad drop and it protected the screen as advertised - I was able to pull it up to replace and the screen underneath looked flawless. With these sorts of protectors on phones I always have so many install issues. Inevitably you need to recenter or work a bubble out. No such issue with this product! Between the extremely effective cleaning/drying wipes they provide and the nice guide stickers to help you line it up this product went on flawlessly the first time around!
customer_reviews.author: lo_dash

customer_reviews.title: Great for value, cheapish in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for its price. However when attempting to put one on, it cracked in half The glass must be fairly cheap, but my second attempt went better until i put it in by book bag one time and found a nick in the screen protector already, the top half. It doesn't feel very quality, but for its price and quantity id say its a fine buy to protect the Switch's plastic screen from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Keanu

customer_reviews.title: Improved application process
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this screen protector with others, and these are for varying screen sizes, I'd have to give this one a definite edge in ease of application. I've always had minor issues with other brands not quite lining up or a bit of misplacement, but this just went on as I wanted. The only thing that isn't perfect is one of the corners for some reason doesn't want to stick to the screen. It was probably something I did during the process, so I'm not going to worry about it. Great protector! It'd be nice if these were available for other screens also (truthfully, I haven't looked yet).
customer_reviews.author: B. Binkerd

customer_reviews.title: Nice install
customer_reviews.text: I have three Switches so this pack was the most affordable. The thing I liked the most is the instructions to install the protector. There are ten steps and if followed you can install with out it going on crooked or having bubbles. The glass is a little thicker so it makes the Switch fit in its dock nice and snug. I haven’t seen any scratches yet but that is the only thing I worry about with a tight fit. Overall I would buy this pack again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen protectors. Use masking tape for alignment though.
customer_reviews.text: Nice glass screen protectors. I installed on 2 Switches and the install went fine. The included alignment tape is the same adhesive as the dust removal tape, but I found it left adhesive residue on the Switch body. It came off OK, but for the second install I just used painters masking tape for alignment and that came off clean. Fits fine in the dock too. You can feel it just slightly more snug, but that’s no problem at all. Really you should be using a screen protector anyway because Nintendo’s terrible dock design will scratch up the stock plastic screen where it presses against it on both sides. I know this from experience.
customer_reviews.author: Who's on First

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gotta give this a 5 the box is hella durable its lik a mini text book or lik one of them books where ppl cut out a square and glue it and hide their keys or money in, the box is not this product but the box protects the glass screen protector which for lik phones and stuff i had them arrived broken but this is prefect condition and easy to install good job

customer_reviews.title: Caused Permanent Damage to My Screen!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most difficult and disappointing screen protector applications that I have ever done. I used two out of the three protectors that were sent, and not only did NEITHER of them apply without bubbles in the middle as well as the corners, but they also caused permanent damage to my screen! I recently bought the Animal Crossing exclusive switch console that I already know Nintendo cannot repair. Now, I am stuck with permanent damage on a collector's item due to this company's poor manufacturing. I HIGHLY advise you do not purchase from this company at all!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good screen protector. What some others were missing are all here with this one. You get the glass screen (3 of them), dust removers, edge aligners for placement and the hard cardboard squeegee to press out any bubbles, as well as detailed instructions. On mine, for some reason I couldnt get two spots to get removed. They looked kind of like large bubbles, almost like the adhesive was not sticking. I simply lifted the corner closest to the spot, lifted up and then pressed down and squeezed leading back to the corner. Poof! problem solved. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: I hate screen protectors. I am terrible at putting them on straight and without bubbles. But I am clumsy, so I need screen protectors. I bought these iVoler ones after mine cracked (I was so glad it was the protector itself that cracked, not the Switch screen!) and I am pleased. I was able to put it on almost perfectly straight, and there are no bubbles. There was a big bubble at first that I couldn't work out, so I was a little bummed. But then it was gone the next day! A few of the reviewers here say that the bubbles work themselves out after a day or so, and they are correct.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pez

customer_reviews.title: Scary - but works well
customer_reviews.text: I just ended up finishing the installation - it worked as advertised. I do suggest watching a good YouTube video on the installation as it made the process easier and less stressful. One thing of note - after having a sizable air bubble I lifted the screen to get it out - and it never fully stuck afterwards. So I put on a need cover and when I had to do the same - it worked and I was able to get all of the bubbles out. Tip - don't lift to high and make sure it fits squarely with the edged of your Switch. Good luck! It is worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Everette

customer_reviews.title: QC allowed for 2 of 3 broken shields... Last one was warped.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 3 broken on arrival, and one warped in corner and does not lie flat. Not sure how it passed QC. No hard tool to push out air bubbles. However, good instructions and sticker tools.
customer_reviews.author: D1UCB4U

customer_reviews.title: no-brainer purchase for any switch owner
customer_reviews.text: After cracking my phone last year, I was quick to buy and put this product on my Switch. I have now had one of the protectors on for over a year and have not come across any issues with the product. It was easy to apply to the screen and mine included a bonus screen-cleaning cloth. For the price and the fact that it comes with 3 different screen protectors, this is definitely a product I would recommend for all Switch-owners to purchase. I have not dropped my Switch so I can't attest to the product's drop protection but for gentle use, it does the job and makes me feel more secure bringing my Switch around.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Offers Good Protection and Easy Installtion
customer_reviews.text: Very good screen protectors. THe one minus I would like to put is that the bottom edge and top edge of the Switch screen don't seem to function perfectly when you try to use multiple fingers at once. Not many people would catch this, but I did as I play Voez quite often and some inputs don't go through when using multiple fingers. I think this is an issue with all of these screen portectors those as my previous one which was from a different company had the same issue. Overall, very good though - most people won't hae to worry about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you read the reviews/comments
customer_reviews.text: I've installed screen protectors/glass for years. After reading the other users' comments about installing in a humid bathroom I decided to try that on this one. Left the shower on for about 5-10 minutes let it build up some steam; then, Switch and protector in hand went in there, wiped off the Switch screen with a fresh microfiber cloth and popped the protector on. Zero issues! Other than one spec of dust in the right corner (that I missed) it's absolutely perfect in the application. It doesn't interfere with the Switch dock and protects the screen well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for multiple switch owners
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my youngest brother who got a switch for his birthday due to his other two siblings unwilling to share of setup another game with him. Due to problems I've heard and seen with screens I began mysearch for a screen protector for him. After comparing prices this was the best option and it gave additional screens. Installation was very easy to do so he was ready to go. After a week no problems at all. So now his only problem is the middle child stealing his switch due to his fortnite addiction.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Make sure to clean the screen thoroughly with the wipes it comes with and match up exactly with the screen. I just let mine fall into place after making sure it was perfectly aligned and there were no bubbles or imperfections. Just make sure your hands are clean and you have cleaned the switch screen perfectly. This was a great price and product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my cheap non-tempered glass screen protector that came with my Switch protective case with this one. This is definitely a million times better since it's glass and covers the entire screen from edge to edge. I had no problem installing the screen protector. It adhered easily to the screen and didn't even leave bubbles. The only qualm I have was that the hinge stickers were a bit too sticky that they left sticky marks on the plastic edge of my Switch. I was able to remove them using a damp cloth though so it's fine now. Overall, I recommend this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanah

customer_reviews.title: Tricky install, worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: These things are never easy to install. The product it self is perfect. They provide 3 protectors, stickers for alignment, a handy instruction card, a soft squeegee, a wet and dry wipes for all 3 protectors in a nice plastic case. Adhesion was perfect. The trick is to set the protector down and use the soft card to force air out from the center first towards the edges other wise you can get air bubble trapped in the center of the screen. I took me 2 attempts to get right but i am 100% happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a Nintendo Switch when I read horror stories of the Switch's dock scratching screens. After spending $300 on the console, there was no way I was going to risk damaging the screen on the device. These screen protectors fit perfectly on the switch and installed without any bubbles. Just use make sure you screen is clean and completely free of dust particles; I recommend using scotch tape to pick up any dust/lint just before you apply the protector. A superb product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling off, installed correctly
customer_reviews.text: I've bought screen protectors before because I have 2 switches and they are only used in portable mode basically. For some reason these screen protectors don't stay on properly. They keep lifting off from random places and then they might just fall off. They were installed correctly, between phones, tablets and other devices we have installed like 1000 protectors at this point so we know the best way to do it.. so I just don't know about these ones...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worked with the first one.
customer_reviews.text: Going to sound like everyone else's review, but I've tried two other screen protectors before this one. The air bubbles in each of them were ridiculous. I understand there is some level of skill to ensuring no air bubbles, but still. Got this because it was cheap, well reviewed, and comes with three! I can screw up twice before needing to sweat about wasting money. Got it with the first attempt though. Significantly easier than the others I've tried. Did from one side to the other, not center out. caught one air bubble in middle, but the little tool provided helped get that out with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ascher

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, until warmed up.
customer_reviews.text: So this screen protector worked really well. Installed easy etc. Then one day this week I left my switch in my car (it was in my carrying case in the backseat). It wasn't a particularly hot day but it was sunny, so the cars definitely got toasty inside. Bubbles started forming under the screen from the outside of the screen to the center as it heated up so now there is a circle of clear screen in the middle surrounded by small bubbles. Luckily I have a spare to replace it, but come on, the screen protector is ruined by heat??? That seems like a major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Skitt

customer_reviews.title: nice protector
customer_reviews.text: It came in a nice plastic hard case with wet and dry wipes. Each screen protector also came inside a wrapped sleeve for further protection, which was nice. Its a thick protector, like hard plastic, but still thin enough to fit well and adhere. The "back" is what adheres to the screen, and pretty much self adheres. You just have to line it up appropriately. Took me a bit to get it right, but works great. 3 pack is also nice bc I have a backup should I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clean, and working well!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on clean and easy with a new Switch. I personally did not use the provided cleaning materials because the unit is so new, but I can see if there are finger smudges on yours already you'd want to clean it. I have a high quality microfiber cloth I cleared what little dust there was perfectly. I got it in position, made sure it wouldn't catch on the lip of the device, and set it in place. it practically cleared all of the air out from underneath without assistance. I had to press one small bubble out. After a few days it's still holding on petfectly, and my device is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Maaske

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector for the switch.
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased for his nieces Switch as she received 1 for Christmas about a yr after we purchased 1 for our kids and the screen protector works well. they've traveled with their game around the house and to their friends homes and all is well no damage anywhere, although our kids are older 2 adults 1 teen and take pretty good care of their things. My husband's niece is 7yrs old haven't seen her since we put it on her game but I think it's still in 1 piece.
customer_reviews.author: Keta

customer_reviews.title: Got unlucky I guess.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed many of these in my lifetime and this is the only one that I had issues with. I ended up using 2 of the screen protectors because I thought I messed up on the first one. It appears I did it right the first time because I got the same outcome both times. Basically what happened was one side doesn't stay down and elevates above the screen. I then thought it could be my screen, but remembered that my previous screen protectors worked fine. Screen is durable and easy to install. I guess I just got a bad set I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Barzee

customer_reviews.title: Tempered Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new screen protector for the Switch because my old plastic one was curling off the screen. The continued use of the docking feature for the switch caused the plastic screen protector to only last a few months. This set I got has tempered glass for the protection and so far I am liking it quite a bit. No damage and no issues using the touch screen. I would recommend this to anyone looking to buy a screen protector for their Switch.
customer_reviews.author: J Castle

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough!
customer_reviews.text: Really what is there to say? I wanted a glass screen protector for my sons Switch as I wouldn’t use anything less on our own phones. You get 3 in the box so it’s a great value but I got the first one on perfectly. It was very simple to install-in fact I didn’t even need to use the alignment stickers. Time will tell how they hold up but you have two more to use in the future if needed. Good product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect the warranty to be honored
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 screen protectors seemed to be cut well and worked fine. I ended up removing them because I wasn't successful in making sure no dust had gotten underneath during installation, and I had bought this 3-pack so I'd have 3 shots at installing. The 3rd was defective, so I followed the link on the included sheet for product registration and to make a claim on their supposed lifetime warranty. After filling out the Google form the link redirected me to, I was told to expect a response within 2 business hours. On day 5 and no response. Overall, (mostly) good screen protectors for a good price, but don't expect them to honor their "lifetime warranty".
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent installation
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is the first one I've seen that has an installation kit that supports aligning the protector before adhering it. You align the protector and use two included stickers to create a hinge, allowing you to flip the protector away from the screen while preserving the alignment. After cleaning and preparing the screen, you simply flip the protector back into place, perfectly positioned. Very pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One of the screen protectors came dirty! But other 2 were ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 screen protectors looked like it had a speck of food or something on the side that was supposed to adhere to the screen!! I was furious, had to throw it away!! The other 2 were fine, other than looking streaky like they've were wet before? But, wiped down after applying and can't even tell while playing. Had a few bubble issues while applying, but were easy to fix. I just hope it actually protects the screen at least....
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was so easy to install on my son's Switch. The protector itself is very durable considering the beating it goes through with a 6 year old boy. The protector does not come up on the edges which is a plus. Overall this protector has been holding up beautifully and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 kids & 2 dogs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to install. I only have one complaint and that is that the sticker they use to make temporary hinges slides off easily. So I ended up putting a little bit of the sticker glue on the switch screen. But it was pretty easy to remove. And after that mishap I installed the screen protector and it worked really good. No bubbles, crystal clear and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Coquitos

customer_reviews.title: Clear and Easy
customer_reviews.text: These guys are a dime a dozen now, so it's a bit difficult to draw a line between quality and cost. I applied this to my Switch first try, since I've done plenty of phone installs before for glass protectors. For something of this size, it would be nice if it came with a centering frame rather than just stickers, but it came out well enough. The surface is nice and probably a 6/10 in slickness, so pretty good medium. No optical artifacts or strange edges, everything lined up as expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ly

customer_reviews.title: Actually Tempered glass
customer_reviews.text: I thought that for the price and the quantity that I was getting they would turn out to be just plastic, or thin and flimsy. They are real tempered glass and work very well with the switch. Only had to use one so far and can't see myself using the other two any time soon or at all. Touch compatibility has not been hindered by the shield. I would recommend this for anyone not wanting to scratch their screen.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin De La Puente

customer_reviews.title: Bubbless Glass
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem attaching the glass and removing bubbles from this product beyond dropping the glass my first attempt, oops, but simply and slowly peeling away the glass and trying again gave me no problems. The cleaning cloths completely removed any fingerprints or smudges that were on the switch. Overall a solid product. The only thing I haven't done yet is to test the durability of the product, which I'll hopefully never accidentally do so... fingers crossed. Fortunately, there's a lifetime warranty you can apply for so even if the protector does break and the screen stays in tact you can always get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 3-Pack of Glass screen protectors for my Nintendo Switch and received a 2-Pack of Glass screen protectors for an old iPod Touch. The funniest thing is that on the package it had a sticker that said "Amazon Warehouse Inspected for full satisfaction."
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We’ve broken three so far and my Nintendo switch has survived. He has bitten the screen, thrown or dropped it multiple times and it’s still in perfect shape. These protectors have been through the ringer but definitely protecting my switch. A card comes with that says lifetime warranty, but you never will find the address to get the warranty replacement. It’s cheap enough though so doesn’t really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Great glass protector
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my Nintendo Switch for Christmas and heard that the screen gets scratched easily. So I bought this glass protector and it was very easy to install with no bubbles. The only bad thing I would say is that I didn't find any instructions in the box on how to install it. However, I have always installed my protectors without instructions. I would definitely recommend this for the quality and definitely price.
customer_reviews.author: Eangel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality - You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: While these screen protectors serve their intended purpose, the real issue is quality. Despite being packaged in a hard plastic case with individual padded sleeves, there were marks, imperfections and scratches on 2 of the 3 protectors. The most surprising thing to me was that there are NO protective peels over the front side of the screen protector! The only side with a peel is the adhesive side... While they do serve their purpose, you definitely get what you pay for here. I'll be ordering another brand and I cant wait to throw these garbage protectors away.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I was told one of the first things I needed when I got a switch was a screen protector! I found this pack of three and thought it would do the job nicely. It came with cleaning wipes and tools to make sure the screen protector went on smoothly. It was easy to put on and looks great. However, these screen protectors claim to be fingerprint resistant and definitely are not. But that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH T.

customer_reviews.title: These do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are frequently dropping the Switch, so I knew I had to get something to help protect the screen ASAP. Slapped one of these on there - everything still works great -- touchscreen, clarity, etc.. They continue to drop it, of course. Only one of these has broken so far, but appears to have saved the screen. Just keep calm, put a new one on, and carry on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rees

customer_reviews.title: It's glass. It's cut to fit. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little screen protector. Plenty of cleaning supplies to ensure it installs dust free. The one instruction to pay close attention to is "to install in a dust free area". You need steady hands to line it up, but if you're not confident to do it freehand, the instructions include a couple adhesive tabs that will assist in lining it up. Also helps cut down on the glare. AND... it comes in a three pack!
customer_reviews.author: Dad Bear

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.text: There was a huge bubble, and I could see 1 tiny speck of dust. However in less than 24 hours ther bubble was gone. I am not using touch screen, but need protection for taking it on and out of dock several times daily. Works great, was easy to apply. I'd suggest checking the screen for dust again after pulling off adhesive side and before applying to screen.
customer_reviews.author: Candice J. Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: I received this package so quick. I opened it and tried to take out one of the screens protector. I find out it is damage in 2 spots . Beside that everything is perfect fine, easy to installed. Try to contact the seller but no option for me to do that. That’s why I put my review here. Overall this product is good except that damage, but that is not the seller fault. They don’t know that till their customer open it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Ends up shattering
customer_reviews.text: It's interesting that these are hard glass, but they do shatter after a while. I don't consider that a dealbreaker, but once it starts breaking you'll need a new screen protector. After it's been placed for a while, when you try to peel it off, it shatters like crazy. Honestly, the amFilm one is just better. But these are okay as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me. Easy to install. I saw a user who had problems with the stickers... I never use them they are too hard and I just end um making a mess. I installed the glass by turning it sticky side down, removing the film behind it and instaling it right ontop of the switch screen, then I just used the little cardboard to press down and remove the air. (This is how I install all the tempered glass on my stuff and its so much easier)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fit's perfectly over the screen of the switch. Application instructions could have been better, but any screen protector application is simple without instructions. Comes with wet and dry wipes, the dry wipes provided weren't enough to clean or dry the screen so I had to use a microfiber cloth. There are stickers provided to help align the screen protector and acts as a hinge if applied properly. This helped tremendously with application.
customer_reviews.author: David Franks

customer_reviews.title: Left no bubbles, but dust stickers left some residue thet could be removed
customer_reviews.text: Was super satisfying to see it drop on the switch screen and leave no bubbles whatsoever. I recommend following the instructions in order, and not to skip cleaning the screen and placing the stickers, as they make lining up the protector easy. However upon removing the stickers they left a little bit of residue. The included wet wipe worked to get the residue off. Screen looks good as new! I don't think the dust sticker was worth using personally as any dust could be removed by using the wet wipe, and I was a little worried the dust sticker might tear off and leave a mess on the switch screen (which luckily didn't happen.) In conclusion, Epstein didn't kill himself.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Schreur

customer_reviews.title: They seemed nice...
customer_reviews.text: On close inspection there was lint underneath all the sticky film (sade you place on the Switch) when i removed the initial film before installation. Made sure I was in a "clean room" and even did an application in a steamed room after the hot shower was off. I truly thought it was just me catching lint but i took my phone light and looked close in contrast and noticed there was some lint on all the protectors. Was disappointed and didn't use any of the protectors honestly. I can imagine if people get the protectors though and have a better experience than I did they'd be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fong

customer_reviews.title: Only two pieces not three!!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE !! One glass piece didn’t even have a sticky side!!! We thought we were crazy but it literally was just a plain piece of glass while the other two had a sticky side. Plus there were no instructions and the wipes they give you put lint on the screen instead of removing it! We needed up using different alcohol wipes and our own microfiber cloth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply and does exactly what it needs to do. I had the unfortunate incident of dropping my Switch on the ground screen first, and this protector saved my screen from being shattered. The screen protector itself busted, but there is not even a single scratch on the screen itself. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Rogers

customer_reviews.title: EASIEST INSTRUCTIONS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would need a YouTube video to put this screen protector on the new Switch my Son bought be for my 72nd birthday. After all, I looked at a video on hooking it up to the TV and there the fact that I should buy the screen protector "before" I put the unit in the holder. The instructions were so clear and once done; I had practically no bubbles. Great Product...even for Seniors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie in Lakeland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy installation. Looks great once it's on. Only drawbacks: the wet wipes don't really clean the screen and it was a pain to get the bubbles our since they didn't include a tool to help smooth it out. Otherwise, it's a good product and didn't take too much time to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie B.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions will lead you astray!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say to apply two of the stickers as hinges, but they aren't strong enough to hold so they make the installation overly difficult. After failing and get a misaligned protector using the hinge method, I broke the glass trying to reposition. The second one I just did free hand and it ended up ok. It is slightly corkked and there are two air bubbles in the middle I cant squeeze out. There has to be a better way!
customer_reviews.author: chris7soccer

customer_reviews.title: Rly good. Do buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dropped my Switch a number of times like a clumsy child eating ice cream and screaming about how the T.V. isn’t currently playing Teen Titans and where is my TABLET, MOM?! Since purchasing these screen protectors, I’m glad to say my gosh darn ape hands slipping up has caused no damage to the console itself. The protector has significant wear, there is a crack currently on the left side, but my Switch remains pristine. Planning to buy another pack as a back up in case I forget to put the thing in a protective carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Deliciousness

customer_reviews.title: Hinge sticker leaves glue residue.
customer_reviews.text: The product is packaged nicely. However, the install instructions aren’t very clear. If this was my first time installing a screen protector, the instructions would have been very confusing. It describes the process in words well, but the images are of a phone and not a switch. Also, the instructions don’t show how to hinge the glass. My biggest complaint is that the hinge sticker will leave a glue residue when you peel it off. Just make sure you place the hinge sticker at a place that doesn’t have grooves or indents.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hebblethwaite

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: So glad we purchased these. I had no idea how often we would be using our Switch as a handheld vs using it on the tv. If you are pulling the unit out of the base on a regular basis you are going to scratch the screen sooner or later. Having three of these for the price is incredible. Super easy to install and crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: J1976

customer_reviews.title: One arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.text: One of the screens arrived cracked... luckily there are two more and I needed one right away, otherwise I would have returned them. They came packaged in a hard plastic case not sure how it would have gotten damaged. Must have been damage during the manufacturing process. The tempered glass itself is easy to use and install... just a bit annoyed that one is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: My_9_Rides_Shotgun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was easy to install. I actually forgot to take a peak at the instructions and was still able to get it on fast and easily. Be sure to make sure your screen protector is in the exact place and position you want it as lifting it, especially from the sides, too much can cause it to not sit flat after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I usually detest installing any sort of screen protector. Whether it’s for a phone or gaming system. However, this product made it easy! I decided to go with the 3 pack in case I made mistakes or broke the first few attempts. I followed some other reviews that stated not to use the cloth or adhesive wipe that comes with. In my first attempt it came out perfect! No bubbles or cracks. This product is an excellent quality and price for as many as you get. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: They’re nice
customer_reviews.text: They work well and it’s great that you three in a pack especially if the switch is used by a child or someone who takes it on the go frequently and could drop it. They were easy to install and don’t seem to make the touch screen any harder to use. I will say you get what you pay off and these do not keep the finger prints off like some of the higher end more expensive protectors do. Otherwise they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but confusing
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit confusing at first to install but I just looked it up on YouTube and easily found a video that showed me how. The hinge tape left my switch sticky where the tape was in contact with the switch body. Other wise it gives a clear picture, doesn't hinder the touch screen, and isn't to bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was previously using amFilm screen protectors on my own switch. My kid saved up and bought a switch so decided to try this version too. At first, after install i had MASSIVE bubbles on the screen still. I don't remember having bubbles like that with the amFilm protectors. I was very worried that I bought an inferior product. But after about 36 hours all the bubbles disappeared and the protector looks/feels great. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very use to applying screen protectors and this one was awful. I tried using all three screens and they were cheap and dirty! I ended up going to Walmart the next day and purchasing the Nintendo brand screen (Came with only 1) for the same price and it came out perfect on the first try. I would save my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass. Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: When I put it on, I did it like any other screen protector. The first protector wouldn’t stick after I cleaned my screen and it broke when I was trying to fix it. my second screen protector had dust stuck to it and it had smudges on it when it came out of the package. There are better options for around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Damond J.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions and everything you need is included. I've installed a lot of screen protectors over the years, but haven't seen the hinge stickers included before, these made it really easy to align the protector perfectly. When I initially installed it it adhered too quickly and had a big bubble, but i was able to carefully pry up the corner and now it's perfect, like it was installed from the factory. It's thick enough that it seems like it provides good protection but doesn't affect touchscreen sensitivity that I can tell. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: W. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Good screen & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good customer service. The screen I had installed at first randomly cracked and I contacted the seller. They responded promptly and sent me a replacement! As far as its functionality, it applies easily and I havent had any issues apart from the odd crack. Its a good protector and serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Connie H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some extra protection for our new Nintendo Switch so found this reasonably priced set of three. I like to have extra on hand just in case. Very easy to install if you’ve ever done a similar job like a phone or tablet. Protector was an exact fit. Comes in a durable plastic case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Actually easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I took my time and followed the instructions because I've had pretty bad experiences with the glass covers for phones. This went on quite easily with no bubbles, though! I left it out of the dock to cure for a couple hours, but that may not have been necessary. Overall, a pretty cheap and simple way to add to the life of your equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but could be better especially on the corners
customer_reviews.text: This is ok screen protector. A few days after I installed, I noticed that corners are not sealed well. Then gradually the screen began to peal itself. I tried to install a new one and the same result with all 3 packs came with. I'm on the last one and hopefully the screen won't come out.
customer_reviews.author: NYCPizza

customer_reviews.title: invisible protection!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install and covers most of the screen with only tiny cutouts around the edge. had no issues with bubbles during application and appears invisible once applied, can't tell i have a screen protector on. still fits in dock perfectly if you were worried for some reason about that.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A

customer_reviews.title: Installed it perfectly on my Nintendo Switch in one try.
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you're looking for an extra layer of protection for your Nintendo Switch! When I bought this screen protector kit, it came with things like screen cleaning wet wipes, cleaning cloth, etc. I didn't use any of that personally since my Switch was brand new and wasn't used yet. The only thing I used in this kit was the sticker to pick up very tiny bits of dust. I then applied the screen protector by following the instructions to a tee and it was perfect. Zero air bubbles on the 1st try. That's a first for me!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles don't leave from the edges, they break up and permanently stay inside. Distortion
customer_reviews.text: There were some big bubbles, and although most left, some don't go towards the edge and just splatter inside leaving tons of mini- smaller air bubbles. Yes I'm using a flat plastic card to move it straight but once it goes towards the edge, I think the adhesive is too strong and the bubbles refuse to leave that way. Not happy, as this doesn't happen with other protectors. Also once I flatten and press the protector on I see these weird distorting lines that I think is a result of the way the protector fell on the screen. I cleaned my screen and perfectly aligned it so I don't know what's up as this has never happened with others.
customer_reviews.author: Nate A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install durable screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector looks great the kit comes with everything you need to install it like a pro. Actually it comes with everything you need to install all three, if one ever breaks that is. This a a durable screen protector, no loss of image and it is what should’ve been sent with the switch from the beginning. All my friends are ordering theirs now!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Air bubbles, won't lay flat, wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've put screen protectors on my Android watch, multiple phones, and iPads. This one is terrible. There were air bubbles on the first try, took it off and it was crooked so I tried again, the corners were chipped at this point so they wouldn't lay flat but it didn't matter because it wouldn't stick. Second try, more air bubbles and the corner won't lay flat. Not to mention that the surface is difficult to clean. It holds onto fingerprints moreso than my watch and phone. I wouldn't get this brand again. 2 stars because it will still protect it, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing nintendo switch screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got these! They are a great price for the 3 pack. We still have the first protector we put on our switch (I put it on the night it arrived a few months ago) and it has done the job of protecting! I wasn't expecting such good quality for the price but was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kirby

customer_reviews.title: The Best Screen Protector for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: These tempered glass screen protectors provide much needed protection for the Switch. While the screen is plastic and does not shatter when dropped, it scratches very easily and this can be frustrating for people who like to make sure their products are in pristine condition. The installation was tricky and it took two tries to get it on perfectly but now I feel much more at ease knowing my screen won't get scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Fire Storm

customer_reviews.title: Easy install with no bubbles or adhesive issues
customer_reviews.text: After trying another brand that would not apply without faulty adhesive spots, I decided to try out this 3-pack. I'm happy to report I only needed one. It went on perfectly the first time and I didn't have to fight with bubbles or any other annoying issues. It fits perfectly and the screen looks great with no loss in quality from using the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: stardewkitteh

customer_reviews.title: Super deal, super product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a steal for the money. I will definitely buy again. I put the protector on my sons switch, three months later he dropped it from the roof of my sub. He was so upset because the screen appeared to be shattered! Took the screen protector off and not one scratch on the original. Bonus... this came as a three pack, so i just placed another on. Suler easy to read instructions. Will be buying again for sure. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this protector along with the dockable MUMBA blade series where I've seen testimonies of people complaining that glass protectors adding too much thickness will result with too much pressure applied in order to dock the switch with it. I was a relief to find out this screen protector is only 0.3mm thick which is perfect and good quality, sticks well and no fingerprints whatsoever (and my finger do sweat...) and although there is some pressure to be applied to dock it, it doesn't feel more than a snug fit. Overall this product has good value for money and seems to be triple A quality - fits well with the dockable MUMBA blade on my switch V2 version.
customer_reviews.author: Tamir G

product_meta.title: [3 Pack] Screen Protector Tempered Glass for Nintendo Switch, iVoler Transparent HD Clear Anti-Scratch Screen Protector Compatible Nintendo Switch
feature_bullets: Specifically designed for Nintendo Switch 2017 and Switch New Model HAC-001(-01).
Ultra-clear High Definition with 99.9% transparency to allow an optimal, natural viewing experience
Ultra thin-0.3mm thickness is reliable and resilient, and promises full compatibility with touchscreen sensitivity
Highly durable, and scratch resistant - surface hardness 9H and topped with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints.

Includes: 3x GLASS Screen Protector, Wet Wipes, Micro-Fiber Cleaning Cloth, Squeeze Card,Easy Installation Use Guide.iVoler offers no-worry 24 months if you are not fully satisfied with our screen protector, iVolerDirect adhere to the high-quality products and services for the purpose.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,399 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
